channel.title: 乐园
channel.description: 一个新时代农民工的随手笔记

item.title: 基于 QEMU 的 Linux 内核编译和安装
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<p>本文主要记录个人做存储系统研究时，在 QEMU 环境下编译和安装 Linux 内核的过程</p>
<h2 id="安装虚拟机系统" class="heading-element"><span>安装虚拟机系统</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e8%99%9a%e6%8b%9f%e6%9c%ba%e7%b3%bb%e7%bb%9f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>之前在 <a href="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/b8506868/#qemu-%e5%88%b6%e4%bd%9c%e5%92%8c%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e7%b3%bb%e7%bb%9f%e9%95%9c%e5%83%8f">利用 RocksDB + ZenFS 测试 ZNS 的环境搭建和使用</a> 给出过借助 VNC 进行图形化安装的步骤，这里再给出仅通过终端进行安装的步骤</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 下载 Ubuntu 镜像</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">wget https://releases.ubuntu.com/24.04.1/ubuntu-24.04.1-live-server-amd64.iso
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 制作磁盘镜像，大小随意</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">qemu-img create -f qcow2 u24s.qcow2 80G
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># ubuntu 镜像挂在 cdrom 上启动</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -enable-kvm 用于开启 KVM 虚拟化</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -boot once=d 用于只从 cdrom 启动一次</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -nographic 用于关闭图形界面</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">qemu-system-x86_64 -m 8G -smp <span class="m">4</span> -enable-kvm -nographic -hda u24s.qcow2 <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span> -cdrom ubuntu-24.04.1-live-server-amd64.iso -boot <span class="nv">once</span><span class="o">=</span>d</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub1.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="/posts/5fce01ae/grub1.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>按 &lt;code&gt;e&lt;/code&gt; 进入编辑模式</h2><p>按 e 进入编辑模式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub1.png" alt="按 &lt;code&gt;e&lt;/code&gt; 进入编辑模式" srcset="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub1.png?size=small, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub1.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="按 e 进入编辑模式" style="--width: 1786px;--aspect-ratio: 1786 / 1030;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">按 <code>e</code> 进入编辑模式</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>然后在 grub menu 按 <code>e</code> 进入编辑模式</p>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub2.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="/posts/5fce01ae/grub2.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>新增 console=ttyS0</h2><p>新增 console=ttyS0</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub2.png" alt="新增 console=ttyS0" srcset="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub2.png?size=small, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub2.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/5fce01ae/grub2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="新增 console=ttyS0" style="--width: 1786px;--aspect-ratio: 1786 / 1030;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">新增 console=ttyS0</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>然后在 vmlinuz 那一行新增 <code>console=ttyS0</code>，之后 <code>ctrl+x</code> 启动即可</p>
<p>安装完毕后，后续启动命令可以简化</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">qemu-system-x86_64 -m 8G -smp <span class="m">4</span> -enable-kvm -nographic -hda u24s.qcow2</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>但是此时的启动过程中的 grub menu 不会显示，还需要修改下 grub 配置</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo vim /etc/default/grub
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 修改下面三个配置项</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">#GRUB_TIMEOUT_STYLE=hidden</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">GRUB_TIMEOUT</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">GRUB_TERMINAL</span><span class="o">=</span>console
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo update-grub
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo poweroff</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如果想通过 ssh 登陆虚拟机，启动参数可以加一个端口转发</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">qemu-system-x86_64 -m 8G -smp <span class="m">4</span> -enable-kvm -nographic -hda u24s.qcow2 <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span> -net nic,model<span class="o">=</span>virtio -net user,hostfwd<span class="o">=</span>tcp::6666-:22</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>之后就可以在物理机器上通过 ssh 登陆虚拟机了</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh -p <span class="m">6666</span> <span class="o">[</span>user<span class="o">]</span>@localhost</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="共享目录" class="heading-element"><span>共享目录</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b1%e4%ba%ab%e7%9b%ae%e5%bd%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>为了加速内核编译，可以在物理机器上编译内核，然后将编译好的内核文件借助共享目录传输到虚拟机中</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 在物理机器上创建共享目录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">mkdir -p xxx/share
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 启动虚拟机时挂载共享目录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">qemu-system-x86_64 -m 8G -smp <span class="m">4</span> -enable-kvm -nographic -hda u24s.qcow2 <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span> -fsdev local,path<span class="o">=</span>xxx/share,id<span class="o">=</span>share_dir,security_model<span class="o">=</span>none <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span> -device virtio-9p-pci,fsdev<span class="o">=</span>share_dir,mount_tag<span class="o">=</span>hostshare <span class="se">\
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="se"></span> -net nic,model<span class="o">=</span>virtio -net user,hostfwd<span class="o">=</span>tcp::6666-:22</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如果报错，很有可能是 <code>qemu</code> 不支持 <code>9p</code>，需要从源码编译 <code>qemu</code>，在 <code>configure</code> 时加上 <code>--enable-virtfs</code> 选项即可</p>
<p>之后在虚拟机中挂载共享目录</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 虚拟机中挂载共享目录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo mkdir -p /mnt/share
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo mount -t 9p -o <span class="nv">trans</span><span class="o">=</span>virtio hostshare /mnt/share/ -oversion<span class="o">=</span>9p2000.L</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如果报错，很有可能是虚拟机的内核不支持 <code>9p</code>，需要编译内核，是打开以下内核配置选项：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_NET_9P=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_NET_9P_VIRTIO=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_NET_9P_DEBUG=y (Optional)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_9P_FS=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_9P_FS_POSIX_ACL=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_PCI=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_VIRTIO_PCI=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_PCI=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_VIRTIO_PCI=y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">CONFIG_PCI_HOST_GENERIC=y (only needed for the QEMU Arm &#39;virt&#39; board)</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="编译内核" class="heading-element"><span>编译内核</span>
 <a href="#%e7%bc%96%e8%af%91%e5%86%85%e6%a0%b8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>在物理机上准备环境</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编译工具，词法语法分析库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt install build-essential bison flex
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 如果编译时缺少 openssl 的相关头文件，需要安装相关库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt install libssl-dev
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 利用 make menuconfig 图形界面配置编译选项需要安装 ncurses 环境：</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt install libncurses5-dev
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 下载 kernel 源码，解压</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">wget https://cdn.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v5.x/linux-5.4.xxx.tar.xz
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">tar xvf linux-5.4.xxx.tar.xz
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">mv linux-5.4.xxx xxx/share/</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在虚拟机内获取内核配置</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo mount -t 9p -o <span class="nv">trans</span><span class="o">=</span>virtio hostshare /mnt/share/ -oversion<span class="o">=</span>9p2000.L
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> /mnt/share/linux-5.4.xxx
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo make oldconfig</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在物理机上编译内核</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 解决 make Error 问题</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo scripts/config --set-str SYSTEM_TRUSTED_KEYS <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo scripts/config --set-str SYSTEM_REVOCATION_KEYS <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编译内核和模块, -j24 表示使用 24 个线程编译, 可以根据自己的 CPU 核心数和内存大小调整</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo make -j24</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在虚拟机内安装内核</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 去除调试信息，解决 initrd.img 过大的问题</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo make <span class="nv">INSTALL_MOD_STRIP</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> modules_install
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo make install
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo poweroff</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="卸载内核" class="heading-element"><span>卸载内核</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8d%b8%e8%bd%bd%e5%86%85%e6%a0%b8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>开发过程中可能会有 bug，需要在虚拟机卸载有问题的内核</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 删除 /lib/modules/ 目录下以内核的版本号为名称的目录</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo rm -rf /lib/modules/5.4.xxx+/
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># （可选）删除 /usr/src/linux/ 目录下不需要的内核源码</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># sudo rm -rf /usr/src/linux-headers-5.4.xxx</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 删除 /boot 目录下启动的内核和内核映像文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo rm /boot/*5.4.xxx*
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 更改 grub 的配置文件，删除不需要的内核启动列表 </span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo update-grub2</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="参考资料" class="heading-element"><span>参考资料</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e8%b5%84%e6%96%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

item.title: Python 使用 matplotlib 画图
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<p>本文将介绍如何使用 Python 的 <code>matplotlib</code> 库画图，记录一些常用的画图 demo 代码</p>
<h2 id="安装" class="heading-element"><span>安装</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 建议先切换到虚拟环境中</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install matplotlib</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="中文显示" class="heading-element"><span>中文显示</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%ad%e6%96%87%e6%98%be%e7%a4%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>新版的 <code>matplotlib</code> 已经支持<a href="https://github.com/matplotlib/matplotlib/pull/20740"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">字体回退功能</a>，因此可以直接设置字体为 <code>Times New Roman</code> 和 <code>SimSun</code>(宋体)。这样英文会以 <code>Times New Roman</code> 显示，中文会以 宋体 显示</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rcParams</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;font.family&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;Times New Roman&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;SimSun&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="折线图点线图" class="heading-element"><span>折线图、点线图</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8a%98%e7%ba%bf%e5%9b%be%e7%82%b9%e7%ba%bf%e5%9b%be" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>plot</code> 即可以绘制折线图，也可以绘制点线图，通过 <code>marker</code> 参数设置点的样式，<code>markersize</code> 设置点的大小</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span><span class="lnt">25
</span><span class="lnt">26
</span><span class="lnt">27
</span><span class="lnt">28
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 设置中文字体为 Times New Roman 和 宋体</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rcParams</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;font.family&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;Times New Roman&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;SimSun&#39;</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 生成数据</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="mi">3</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 绘制点线图</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">marker</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;o&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">markersize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;y=x^3&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 添加坐标轴标签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;x&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;y&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 配置坐标轴范围</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">xlim</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylim</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 添加图例</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">legend</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 配置紧凑布局</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tight_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pad</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 保存图片</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">savefig</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;plot.png&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><img loading="lazy" src="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/731b80f7/plot.png" alt="点线图" srcset="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/731b80f7/plot.png?size=small, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/731b80f7/plot.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/731b80f7/plot.png?size=large 2x" data-title="点线图" style="--width: 944px;--aspect-ratio: 944 / 708;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></p>
<h2 id="柱状图堆积柱状图" class="heading-element"><span>柱状图、堆积柱状图</span>
 <a href="#%e6%9f%b1%e7%8a%b6%e5%9b%be%e5%a0%86%e7%a7%af%e6%9f%b1%e7%8a%b6%e5%9b%be" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>bar</code> 绘制柱状图，通过 <code>bottom</code> 参数可以绘制堆积柱状图</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-python" data-lang="python"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 生成数据</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">y1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">y2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 绘制堆积柱状图</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;tab:blue&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">edgecolor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;black&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">label</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">&#39;y1=1&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">width</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">)</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">ax2</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">d</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">d</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">d</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">d</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="o">**</span><span class="n">kwargs</span><span class="p">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

item.title: 电信光猫中兴 F7010C 折腾记录
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<h2 id="问题描述" class="heading-element"><span>问题描述</span>
 <a href="#%e9%97%ae%e9%a2%98%e6%8f%8f%e8%bf%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>近期家里更新了千兆宽带，电信光猫换成了中兴 F7010C，默认光猫拨号，安装人员不给改桥接，而且路由器还获取不到 IPv6 地址</p>
<p>尝试过对路由器的 IPv6 进行配置，但是发现无论怎么配置，都无法获取到 IPv6 地址，并且也尝试了设备直连光猫，也无法获取到 IPv6 地址，因此怀疑是光猫的问题，所以才有了这一段折腾</p>
<p>主要参考了网上的一些资料，个人根据自己的情况和理解做了一些修改</p>
<h2 id="解锁超管密码" class="heading-element"><span>解锁超管密码</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a7%a3%e9%94%81%e8%b6%85%e7%ae%a1%e5%af%86%e7%a0%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>网上给出的解锁 F7010C 的解锁方式都是通过对电信的官方 APP《小翼管家》进行抓包，然后借助抓包软件的断点和重写功能，来修改请求的内容，从而获取超管密码</p>
<h3 id="前言" class="heading-element"><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>现在对安卓的 APP 进行抓包，其实还是比较困难的。
首先当前的网络包基本都是 HTTPS 加密的，为了能够抓到 HTTPS 的包，需要通过中间人攻击的方式来查看 HTTPS 的明文内容</p>
<p>当客户端与抓包软件的代理服务器进行通信时，抓包软件需要重签远程服务器的 SSL 证书。
为了保证客户端与抓包软件成功进行 SSL 握手通信，需要将抓包软件的 CA 根证书安装到客户端本地的证书管理中心</p>
<p>但是安卓 7.0 之后，由于 Google 的安全策略，用户自行安装的用户证书不再被信任，因此需要进行额外的配置</p>
<h3 id="配置安卓抓包环境" class="heading-element"><span>配置安卓抓包环境</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e5%ae%89%e5%8d%93%e6%8a%93%e5%8c%85%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>由于自行安装的用户证书不再被信任，但是系统证书还是可以被信任的，因此需要将抓包软件的 CA 根证书导入到系统证书中</p>
<p>但是系统证书通常在 <code>/system</code> 目录下，而 <code>/system</code> 目录是只读的，因此需要先将 <code>/system</code> 目录挂载为可读写的目录，然后再将证书导入到系统证书中</p>
<p>这意味着需要 root 权限，所以个人改用安卓模拟器来进行抓包。
安装模拟器的过程就不再赘述了，个人选择了 MuMu 模拟器</p>
<p>首先在设置中开启 root 权限和 system 读写权限</p>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afroot%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="./MuMu-开启root权限.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>开启 root 权限</h2><p>开启 root 权限</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afroot%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png" alt="开启 root 权限" srcset="./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afroot%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=small, ./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afroot%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afroot%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=large 2x" data-title="开启 root 权限" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">开启 root 权限</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afsystem%e8%af%bb%e5%86%99%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="./MuMu-开启system读写权限.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>开启 system 读写权限</h2><p>开启 system 读写权限</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afsystem%e8%af%bb%e5%86%99%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png" alt="开启 system 读写权限" srcset="./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afsystem%e8%af%bb%e5%86%99%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=small, ./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afsystem%e8%af%bb%e5%86%99%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./MuMu-%e5%bc%80%e5%90%afsystem%e8%af%bb%e5%86%99%e6%9d%83%e9%99%90.png?size=large 2x" data-title="开启 system 读写权限" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">开启 system 读写权限</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>抓包工具选择了 <a href="https://reqable.com/zh-CN/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Reqable</a>，这是一款国人开发的抓包工具，有中文界面，并且支持断点和重写功能，而且免费的社区版功能也足够使用了</p>
<p>安装证书的方式，Reqable 给了非常详细的图文教程，主要的不同在于需要对 <code>/system</code> 重新挂载，然后再通过 <code>adb</code> 将证书导入到系统证书中</p>

<li>
<p>先打开《小翼管家》APP，绑定好电信光猫，先点进去【网关设置】界面
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="./%e5%b0%8f%e7%bf%bc%e7%ae%a1%e5%ae%b6-%e7%bd%91%e5%85%b3%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae.jpg?size=large" data-thumbnail="./小翼管家-网关设置.jpg?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>小翼管家-网关设置</h2><p>小翼管家-网关设置</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="./%e5%b0%8f%e7%bf%bc%e7%ae%a1%e5%ae%b6-%e7%bd%91%e5%85%b3%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae.jpg" alt="小翼管家-网关设置" srcset="./%e5%b0%8f%e7%bf%bc%e7%ae%a1%e5%ae%b6-%e7%bd%91%e5%85%b3%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae.jpg?size=small, ./%e5%b0%8f%e7%bf%bc%e7%ae%a1%e5%ae%b6-%e7%bd%91%e5%85%b3%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae.jpg?size=medium 1.5x, ./%e5%b0%8f%e7%bf%bc%e7%ae%a1%e5%ae%b6-%e7%bd%91%e5%85%b3%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae.jpg?size=large 2x" data-title="小翼管家-网关设置" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">小翼管家-网关设置</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>配置 WiFi 的代理后，在抓包软件中启动抓包，然后在《小翼管家》中切换【指示灯】</p>
</li>

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="./Reqable-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%ad%e7%82%b9.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="./Reqable-配置断点.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>Reqable-配置断点</h2><p>Reqable-配置断点</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="./Reqable-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%ad%e7%82%b9.png" alt="Reqable-配置断点" srcset="./Reqable-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%ad%e7%82%b9.png?size=small, ./Reqable-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%ad%e7%82%b9.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./Reqable-%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%96%ad%e7%82%b9.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Reqable-配置断点" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Reqable-配置断点</figcaption>

item.title: 解决 kex_exchange_identification 报错
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<h2 id="踩坑" class="heading-element"><span>踩坑</span>
 <a href="#%e8%b8%a9%e5%9d%91" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>最近在使用 <code>git</code> 时，发现 <code>git pull</code> 时经常会出现下面的报错 <code>kex_exchange_identification: Connection closed by remote host</code>，导致无法正常拉取代码</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ git pull
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">kex_exchange_identification: Connection closed by remote host
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Connection closed by 192.30.255.113 port <span class="m">22</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">fatal: Could not <span class="nb">read</span> from remote repository.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Please make sure you have the correct access rights
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">and the repository exists.</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="原因分析" class="heading-element"><span>原因分析</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8e%9f%e5%9b%a0%e5%88%86%e6%9e%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>和之前的 <a href="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/2e7aa01a/">解决 pip 安装第三方包时因 SSL 报错</a> 原因类似，都是因为网络代理导致的</p>
<p>主要是代理服务商为了安全考虑，避免被人当作跳板，会主动拒绝 22 端口的连接，导致无法正常连接到 Github 的服务器</p>
<h2 id="解决办法" class="heading-element"><span>解决办法</span>
 <a href="#%e8%a7%a3%e5%86%b3%e5%8a%9e%e6%b3%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>知道原因之后，解决办法就很简单了，主要有三种</p>
<h3 id="1-临时关闭代理" class="heading-element"><span>1. 临时关闭代理</span>
 <a href="#1-%e4%b8%b4%e6%97%b6%e5%85%b3%e9%97%ad%e4%bb%a3%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>虽然关闭代理最简单，但是可能会导致下载速度过慢</p>
<h3 id="2-修改代理软件配置22-端口走直连" class="heading-element"><span>2. 修改代理软件配置，22 端口走直连</span>
 <a href="#2-%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e4%bb%a3%e7%90%86%e8%bd%af%e4%bb%b6%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae22-%e7%ab%af%e5%8f%a3%e8%b5%b0%e7%9b%b4%e8%bf%9e" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>最安全的办法是修改代理软件的配置，将 22 端口走直连，不同的代理软件配置方式不同，这里就不详细介绍了</p>
<h3 id="3-改用-https-协议走-443-端口" class="heading-element"><span>3. 改用 HTTPS 协议，走 443 端口</span>
 <a href="#3-%e6%94%b9%e7%94%a8-https-%e5%8d%8f%e8%ae%ae%e8%b5%b0-443-%e7%ab%af%e5%8f%a3" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>个人最推荐的办法是改用 HTTPS 协议，走 443 端口，因为这样不仅可以解决上面的问题，还可以通过代理提高下载速度</p>
<p>这里主要参考了 <a href="https://docs.github.com/zh/authentication/troubleshooting-ssh/using-ssh-over-the-https-port"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Github 官方的教程</a></p>
<p>在 <code>~/.ssh/config</code> 文件中添加下面的配置即可，之后就可以正常使用 <code>git pull</code> 等操作了</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Host github.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Hostname ssh.github.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> Port <span class="m">443</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> User git</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="参考资料" class="heading-element"><span>参考资料</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e8%b5%84%e6%96%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li><a href="https://github.com/vernesong/OpenClash/issues/1960"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【Github】开启OpenClash之后，无法使用 git clone/push，kex ssh 密钥错误</a></li>
<li><a href="https://docs.github.com/zh/authentication/troubleshooting-ssh/using-ssh-over-the-https-port"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【Github】在 HTTPS 端口使用 SSH</a></li>
</ul>

item.title: 从 C 过渡到 C++
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<h2 id="前言" class="heading-element"><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>由于 C 语言缺乏对 Map、Set 等数据结构的支持，在写算法题时，经常需要自己实现这些数据结构或者借助第三方库，例如 <a href="https://troydhanson.github.io/uthash/userguide.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">uthash</a> 等。</p>
<p>但是很难保证，线上笔试的编译环境是否支持这些第三方库，因此为了秋招以及重温对 C++ 的理解，最近在重新梳理 C++ 的知识。</p>
<h2 id="字符串以及文件操作" class="heading-element"><span>字符串以及文件操作</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ad%97%e7%ac%a6%e4%b8%b2%e4%bb%a5%e5%8f%8a%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e6%93%8d%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="字符串" class="heading-element"><span>字符串</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ad%97%e7%ac%a6%e4%b8%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>C++ 支持字符串类型，即 <code>string</code>，而 C 语言中没有字符串类型，只能使用字符数组来表示字符串。
C++ 中的字符串类型为 <code>string</code>，其定义在 <code>string</code> 头文件中。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;iostream&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;string&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="k">namespace</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">string</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">&#34;Hello World&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">cout</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">endl</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>针对 <code>string</code> 类型的变量，可以继续用 <code>[]</code> 进行索引，也可以使用 <code>size()</code> 函数获取字符串的长度。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;iostream&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;string&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="k">namespace</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">string</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">&#34;Hello World&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">size</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="o">++</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">cout</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">cout</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">endl</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>C++ 中的字符串类型和字符数组之间可以相互转换，只需使用 <code>c_str()</code> 函数以及 <code>string</code> 构造函数进行转换即可。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;iostream&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;string&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="k">namespace</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">string</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">&#34;Hello World&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">char</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">strcpy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="n">c_str</span><span class="p">());</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">printf</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">&#34;%s</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s">&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">c</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">string</span> <span class="n">s2</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">c</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">cout</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">s2</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">endl</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="标准输入输出" class="heading-element"><span>标准输入输出</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a0%87%e5%87%86%e8%be%93%e5%85%a5%e8%be%93%e5%87%ba" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>cin</code> 和 <code>cout</code> 是 C++ 的标准输入输出流，分别对应于 C 语言中的 <code>scanf</code> 和 <code>printf</code>。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;iostream&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="k">namespace</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">cin</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">&gt;&gt;</span> <span class="n">b</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">cout</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">b</span> <span class="o">&lt;&lt;</span> <span class="n">endl</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>然而 <code>cout</code> 的格式化输出较为麻烦，例如输出一个浮点数，需要指定精度、小数点后保留的位数等。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-cpp" data-lang="cpp"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;iostream&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span><span class="c1">// iomanip 头文件中定义了一些用于格式化输出的函数
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;iomanip&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">using</span> <span class="k">namespace</span> <span class="n">std</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>

</div><h2 id="stl" class="heading-element"><span>STL</span>
 <a href="#stl" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>STL 即标准模板库是 C++ 中的一个重要组成部分，包含了很多常用的数据结构和算法，例如 <code>vector</code>、<code>map</code>、<code>set</code>、<code>sort</code> 等。</p>
<h3 id="容器与容器适配器" class="heading-element"><span>容器与容器适配器</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%b9%e5%99%a8%e4%b8%8e%e5%ae%b9%e5%99%a8%e9%80%82%e9%85%8d%e5%99%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>C++ 的 STL 包含基础的容器和容器适配器，容器适配器是基础容器的封装，提供了一些特殊的功能。</p>
<ul>
<li>序列式容器：<code>vector</code>、<code>deque</code>、<code>forward_list</code>、<code>list</code>、<code>array</code></li>
<li>关联式容器：<code>set</code>、<code>map</code>、<code>unordered_set</code>、<code>unordered_map</code></li>
<li>容器适配器：<code>stack</code>、<code>queue</code>、<code>priority_queue</code></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="向量-vector" class="heading-element"><span>向量 <code>vector</code></span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%91%e9%87%8f-vector" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>vector</code> 容器类似于 C 语言中的数组，但是 <code>vector</code> 的长度可以动态变化，其常用的成员函数有：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>push_back(xxx)</code>：在数组末尾添加一个元素</li>
<li><code>pop_back()</code>：删除数组末尾的一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace_back(xxx)</code>：在数组末尾添加一个元素，与 <code>push_back</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace_back</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>insert(pos, xxx)</code>：在数组的 <code>pos</code> 位置插入一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace(pos, xxx)</code>：在数组的 <code>pos</code> 位置插入一个元素，与 <code>insert</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>empty()</code>：判断数组是否为空</li>
<li><code>size()</code>：获取数组的长度</li>
<li><code>clear()</code>：清空数组</li>
<li><code>begin()</code>：获取数组的首地址，常用于遍历数组</li>
<li><code>end()</code>：获取数组的末尾地址，常用于遍历数组</li>
<li><code>front()</code>：获取数组的首元素</li>
<li><code>back()</code>：获取数组的末尾元素</li>
</ul>

</div><h3 id="双端队列-deque" class="heading-element"><span>双端队列 <code>deque</code></span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%8c%e7%ab%af%e9%98%9f%e5%88%97-deque" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>deque</code> 容器就是双端队列，可以在队列的首部和末尾添加元素以及删除元素，其常用的成员函数有：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>push_back(xxx)</code>：在队列末尾添加一个元素</li>
<li><code>pop_back()</code>：删除队列末尾的一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace_back(xxx)</code>：在队列末尾添加一个元素，与 <code>push_back</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace_back</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>push_front(xxx)</code>：在队列首部添加一个元素</li>
<li><code>pop_front()</code>：删除队列首部的一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace_front(xxx)</code>：在队列首部添加一个元素，与 <code>push_front</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace_front</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>empty()</code>：判断队列是否为空</li>
<li><code>size()</code>：获取队列的长度</li>
<li><code>clear()</code>：清空队列</li>
<li><code>begin()</code>：获取队列的首地址，常用于遍历队列</li>
<li><code>end()</code>：获取队列的末尾地址，常用于遍历队列</li>
<li><code>front()</code>：获取队列的首元素</li>
<li><code>back()</code>：获取队列的末尾元素</li>
</ul>

 </a>
</h3><p><code>queue</code> 容器就是队列，只能在队列的末尾添加元素，在队列的首部删除元素，其常用的成员函数有：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>push(xxx)</code>：在队列末尾添加一个元素</li>
<li><code>pop()</code>：删除队列首部的一个元素</li>

<li><code>empty()</code>：判断队列是否为空</li>
<li><code>size()</code>：获取队列的长度</li>
<li><code>front()</code>：获取队列的首元素</li>
<li><code>back()</code>：获取队列的末尾元素</li>

</h3><p><code>priority_queue</code> 容器就是优先级队列，其底层实现为堆，其常用的成员函数有：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>push(xxx)</code>：在队列末尾添加一个元素</li>
<li><code>pop()</code>：删除队列首部的一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace(xxx)</code>：在队列末尾添加一个元素，与 <code>push</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>empty()</code>：判断队列是否为空</li>
<li><code>size()</code>：获取队列的长度</li>
<li><code>top()</code>：获取队列的首元素</li>
</ul>

</div><h3 id="集合-set" class="heading-element"><span>集合 <code>set</code></span>
 <a href="#%e9%9b%86%e5%90%88-set" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>set</code> 容器就是集合，其底层实现为红黑树，其常用的成员函数有：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>insert(xxx)</code>：在集合中插入一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace(xxx)</code>：在集合中插入一个元素，与 <code>insert</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>erase(xxx)</code>：删除集合中的一个元素</li>
<li><code>empty()</code>：判断集合是否为空</li>
<li><code>size()</code>：获取集合的长度</li>
<li><code>clear()</code>：清空集合</li>
<li><code>begin()</code>：获取集合的首地址，常用于遍历集合</li>
<li><code>end()</code>：获取集合的末尾地址，常用于遍历集合</li>
<li><code>count(xxx)</code>：查找集合中是否存在某个元素，如果存在则返回 1，否则返回 0</li>
<li><code>find(xxx)</code>：查找集合中是否存在某个元素，如果存在则返回该元素的迭代器，否则返回 <code>end()</code> 迭代器</li>
</ul>

 <a href="#%e6%98%a0%e5%b0%84-map" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>map</code> 容器就是映射，其底层实现也为红黑树，其常用的成员函数有：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>[]</code>：获取映射中某个元素的值，如果不存在则会创建该元素并赋值为 0</li>
<li><code>at(k)</code>：获取映射中某个元素的值，如果不存在则会抛出异常</li>
<li><code>insert(pair&lt;k, v&gt;)</code>：在映射中插入一个元素</li>
<li><code>emplace(k, v)</code>：在映射中插入一个元素，与 <code>insert</code> 的区别是，<code>emplace</code> 效率更高</li>
<li><code>erase(k)</code>：删除映射中的一个元素</li>
<li><code>empty()</code>：判断映射是否为空</li>
<li><code>size()</code>：获取映射的长度</li>
<li><code>clear()</code>：清空映射</li>
<li><code>begin()</code>：获取映射的首地址，常用于遍历映射</li>
<li><code>end()</code>：获取映射的末尾地址，常用于遍历映射</li>
<li><code>count(k)</code>：查找映射中是否存在某个元素，如果存在则返回 1，否则返回 0</li>
<li><code>find(k)</code>：查找映射中是否存在某个元素，如果存在则返回该元素的迭代器，否则返回 <code>end()</code> 迭代器</li>
</ul>
