<h2 id="简介" class="heading-element"><span>简介</span>
 <a href="#%e7%ae%80%e4%bb%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>对于科研工作者来说，从前人论文的图中提取数据来重绘或者对比是一件很常见的事情。
但是有时候论文中的图并没有提供数据，这时候我们就需要自己手动提取数据。
而 <code>WebPlotDigitizer</code> 是一个非常方便的工具，无需安装，直接在网页上即可使用。</p>
<h2 id="功能特点" class="heading-element"><span>功能特点</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8a%9f%e8%83%bd%e7%89%b9%e7%82%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>可以用于提取各种图表（XY，条形，极坐标，三元，地图等）的数据</li>
<li>高效的自动提取算法，非常容易提取大量数据点</li>
<li>免费使用，开源和跨平台（Web 和桌面）</li>
<li>还可以测量各种特征之间的距离或角度</li>
</ul>
<p><code>WebPlotDigitizer</code> 的网页地址为 <a href="https://apps.automeris.io/wpd/index.zh_CN.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://apps.automeris.io/wpd/index.zh_CN.html</a>，并且 <a href="https://github.com/ankitrohatgi/WebPlotDigitizer"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">其源码开源</a>。</p>
<p><figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/139abad8/WebPlotDigitizer.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="/posts/139abad8/WebPlotDigitizer.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2>WebPlotDigitizer</h2><p>WebPlotDigitizer</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/139abad8/WebPlotDigitizer.png" alt="WebPlotDigitizer" srcset="https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/139abad8/WebPlotDigitizer.png?size=small, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/139abad8/WebPlotDigitizer.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://ywang-wnlo.github.io/posts/139abad8/WebPlotDigitizer.png?size=large 2x" data-title="WebPlotDigitizer" style="--width: 3082px;--aspect-ratio: 3082 / 1916;background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">WebPlotDigitizer</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="使用方法" class="heading-element"><span>使用方法</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8%e6%96%b9%e6%b3%95" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>官方有详细的 <a href="https://automeris.io/WebPlotDigitizer/tutorial.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">教程</a>，另外 CSDN 上还有一篇汉化后的 <a href="https://blog.csdn.net/YanLu99/article/details/114172184"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">教程</a>，这里简单介绍一下使用流程。</p>
<ol>
<li>上传图片</li>
<li>标记坐标轴上的已知点，并输入其坐标值</li>
<li>取色器选择需要提取的数据点颜色</li>
<li>利用蒙版选择需要提取的数据点范围</li>
<li>选择合适的颜色距离（其实就是颜色差异度），以及输出点Δ（其实就是数据密度）</li>
<li>点击“运行”提取数据</li>
<li>查看数据，自行导出</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="参考资料" class="heading-element"><span>参考资料</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e8%b5%84%e6%96%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li><a href="https://automeris.io/WebPlotDigitizer/tutorial.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【官网】WebPlotDigitizer 教程</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/ankitrohatgi/WebPlotDigitizer"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【GitHub】WebPlotDigitizer</a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.csdn.net/YanLu99/article/details/114172184"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【CSDN】提取文献中的折线图/散点图数据</a></li>
</ul>

item.title: Python 环境隔离
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<p>Python 作为最常用的脚本语言，有着非常丰富的第三方库，但是这也导致了 Python 的环境管理非常必要。本文将介绍 Python 的几个常用环境管理工具，以及如何使用它们。</p>
<h2 id="前言" class="heading-element"><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>由于 Python 的第三方库非常丰富，因此在开发过程中，我们可能会使用到很多第三方库。
但是，这些第三方库可能会有不同的版本，而且不同的项目可能会使用不同的版本。
如果我们先在 A 项目中使用了老版本的第三方库，而后续在 B 项目中需要使用新版本的第三方库，覆盖了老版本的第三方库，那么 A 项目就可能会出现问题。</p>
<p>当前，个人使用过的 Python 的环境管理工具主要有 <code>venv</code>、<code>virtualenv</code>、<code>virtualenvwrapper</code> 和 <code>conda</code>。</p>
<h2 id="venv" class="heading-element"><span><code>venv</code></span>
 <a href="#venv" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>Python 3.3 之后，Python 自带了 <code>venv</code> 工具，是内置的一个模块，用于创建虚拟环境。</p>
<h3 id="venv-环境管理" class="heading-element"><span><code>venv</code> 环境管理</span>
 <a href="#venv-%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 创建环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">python -m venv &lt;env_dir&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 通常在当前目录下创建 .venv 目录作为虚拟环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">python -m venv .venv
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 激活环境，直接调用相应的脚本即可</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Windows CMD</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">.venv<span class="se">\S</span>cripts<span class="se">\a</span>ctivate.bat
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Windows PowerShell</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">.venv<span class="se">\S</span>cripts<span class="se">\A</span>ctivate.ps1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Linux</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">.venv<span class="se">\S</span>cripts<span class="se">\a</span>ctivate
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 退出环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">deactivate
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 删除环境，只需要删除相应的目录即可</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Windows</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rmdir .venv
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Linux</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rm -rf .venv</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="venv-包管理" class="heading-element"><span><code>venv</code> 包管理</span>
 <a href="#venv-%e5%8c%85%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>激活环境后，直接用 <code>pip</code> 安装、卸载包即可。</p>
<h2 id="virtualenv-以及-virtualenvwrapper" class="heading-element"><span><code>virtualenv</code> 以及 <code>virtualenvwrapper</code></span>
 <a href="#virtualenv-%e4%bb%a5%e5%8f%8a-virtualenvwrapper" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>virtualenv</code> 是一个第三方的包，用于创建虚拟环境。
<code>venv</code> 其实就是 <code>virtualenv</code> 的一个子集，相当于被官方收录了，可见其实力。</p>
<p>为了更方便地使用 <code>virtualenv</code>，可以使用 <code>virtualenvwrapper</code> ，它对 <code>virtualenv</code> 进行了封装，提供了更方便的命令。
在 Windows 上，可以使用 <code>virtualenvwrapper-win</code>。</p>
<h3 id="安装" class="heading-element"><span>安装</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install virtualenv
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Linux</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install virtualenvwrapper
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># Windows</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">pip install virtualenvwrapper-win</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="virtualenvwrapper-环境管理" class="heading-element"><span><code>virtualenvwrapper</code> 环境管理</span>
 <a href="#virtualenvwrapper-%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 创建环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">mkvirtualenv &lt;env_name&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 激活环境（仍然不太兼容最新的 PowerShell）</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">workon &lt;env_name&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 退出环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">deactivate
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 删除环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rmvirtualenv &lt;env_name&gt;</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="virtualenvwrapper-包管理" class="heading-element"><span><code>virtualenvwrapper</code> 包管理</span>
 <a href="#virtualenvwrapper-%e5%8c%85%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>激活环境后，直接用 <code>pip</code> 安装、卸载包即可。</p>
<h2 id="conda" class="heading-element"><span><code>conda</code></span>
 <a href="#conda" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>conda</code> 是一个开源跨平台语言无关的包管理与环境管理系统。
通常为了方便，可以直接下载包含各种常用软件包的 <code>Anaconda</code>，以及最简环境的 <code>Miniconda</code>。</p>
<p>然而，<code>conda</code> 在 Windows 上的使用体验并不好，暂时还不支持新版本的 <code>PowerShell</code>，其官方的 <a href="https://github.com/conda/conda/issues/12094"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Issue</a> 也有提到这个问题。</p>
<p>所以当前我都是切到 <code>Conmmand Prompt</code> 也就是 <code>CMD</code> 中使用 <code>conda</code>。</p>
<h3 id="conda-环境管理" class="heading-element"><span><code>conda</code> 环境管理</span>
 <a href="#conda-%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2

</span><span class="lnt"> 8

</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 创建环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda create -n &lt;env_name&gt; <span class="o">[</span><span class="nv">python</span><span class="o">=</span>&lt;python_version&gt;<span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">[</span>package_name<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 激活环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda activate &lt;env_name&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 退出环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda deactivate
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 删除环境</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda remove -n &lt;env_name&gt; --all</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="conda-包管理" class="heading-element"><span><code>conda</code> 包管理</span>
 <a href="#conda-%e5%8c%85%e7%ae%a1%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda install &lt;package_name&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda list
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">conda remove &lt;package_name&gt;</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="总结" class="heading-element"><span>总结</span>
 <a href="#%e6%80%bb%e7%bb%93" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>在 Windows 上，在借助 VScode 的 Python 插件的情况下，使用 <code>venv</code> 和 <code>virtualenvwrapper</code> 都还不错，可以快速的激活环境。
而在 Linux 上，使用 <code>conda</code> 也是一个不错的选择。</p>

item.title: FeelIt 主题的配置以及魔改记录
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<div class="details admonition warning open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-exclamation-triangle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>写在最前<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">以下大部分修改在 <a href="https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">FixIt</a> 主题中已经得到了解决，所以个人已经切换到了 FixIt 主题</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<div class="details admonition abstract open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-list-ul fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>摘要<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">本文主要记录了使用 Hugo 的 FeelIt 主题的配置过程，以及对主题的一些修改</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h2 id="简介" class="heading-element"><span>简介</span>
 <a href="#%e7%ae%80%e4%bb%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>Hugo 的主题虽然在 <a href="https://themes.gohugo.io/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官网</a> 上看起来不少，但是大部分主题在 <a href="https://github.com/topics/hugo-theme"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">GitHub</a> 上的活跃度和 Star 数量普遍都不高</p>
<p>经过一番挑选选择了 <a href="https://github.com/khusika/FeelIt"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">FeelIt</a>，他是基于 <a href="https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">LoveIt</a> 主题的一个变体，LoveIt 主题的作者已经不再维护，而 FeelIt 主题的作者在 LoveIt 的基础上进行了一些改进，同时也还在维护中</p>
<h2 id="安装" class="heading-element"><span>安装</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>更换主题非常简单，只需要将主题的仓库克隆到 <code>themes</code> 目录下即可</p>
<p>为了后面自己修改主题方便，先在 GitHub 对原主题进行了 fork，然后再以 <code>submodule</code> 的方式添加到项目中，同时添加一个 <code>upstream</code> 的远程仓库，方便后面同步原主题的更新</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 添加主题</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule add git@github.com:ywang-wnlo/FeelIt.git
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule update
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 添加 upstream 远程仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> themes/FeelIt
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote add upstream https://github.com/khusika/FeelIt</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>为了方便配置主题的参数，可以将主题的配置文件复制到项目的根目录下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 复制配置文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> hugo-blog
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cp -r themes/FeelIt/exampleSite/hugo.toml .</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>主题的配置文件中有很多参数，并且有说明，可以根据自己的需要进行修改，这里就不一一介绍了，具体的可以参考 <a href="https://feelit.khusika.dev/theme-documentation-basics/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官方教程</a></p>
<h2 id="删除每篇文章的作者信息" class="heading-element"><span>删除每篇文章的作者信息</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%a0%e9%99%a4%e6%af%8f%e7%af%87%e6%96%87%e7%ab%a0%e7%9a%84%e4%bd%9c%e8%80%85%e4%bf%a1%e6%81%af" class="heading-mark">

</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="gi">+ &lt;/li&gt;
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="gi">+ {{- end }}
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="gi">+ &lt;/ul&gt;
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="gi">+&lt;/div&gt;
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="gi">+{{ end }}
</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>css</code> 样式改得不太好看，有兴趣的可以自己修改一下，具体的可以参考这个 <a href="https://github.com/ywang-wnlo/FeelIt/commit/4933bceb09358f9ac1ae249c78ebb34dae6be3ed"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">commit：文章底部增加相关推荐</a></p>
<h2 id="参考资料" class="heading-element"><span>参考资料</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e8%b5%84%e6%96%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

item.title: 更换博客框架至 Hugo
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<div class="details admonition abstract open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-list-ul fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>摘要<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">本文主要记录了自己迁移博客至 Hugo 的过程中遇到的问题，以及一些小技巧</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h2 id="前言" class="heading-element"><span>前言</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e8%a8%80" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>由于 Hexo 的环境配置较为复杂，而且个人又有多个电脑写博客的需求。另外 Hexo 的实时预览不能满足个人的需求，此外还有其他小问题，所以决定迁移博客至 Hugo</p>
<p>以下是两个框架之间的简单对比，相同的部分就不列入对比了</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th style="text-align:center"></th>
<th style="text-align:center">Hexo</th>
<th style="text-align:center">Hugo</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">环境配置</td>
<td style="text-align:center">nodejs，配置复杂</td>
<td style="text-align:center">二进制文件，下载即可使用</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">主题</td>
<td style="text-align:center">好看，并且一直在维护（例如：NexT）</td>
<td style="text-align:center">选择较少，并且大多过于简洁并停止维护</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">实时预览</td>
<td style="text-align:center">主题修改需要重新编译</td>
<td style="text-align:center">基本上都可以实时预览</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">文档</td>
<td style="text-align:center">丰富</td>
<td style="text-align:center">相对较少</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center">图片路径</td>
<td style="text-align:center">绝对路径，不能在 VSCode 实时预览</td>
<td style="text-align:center">可以使用相对路径，方便在 VSCode 实时预览</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="安装-hugo" class="heading-element"><span>安装 Hugo</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85-hugo" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>Hugo 的 <a href="https://gohugo.io/documentation/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官网文档</a> 虽然只有英文的，但是内容很全面</p>
<h3 id="安装" class="heading-element"><span>安装</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="windows" class="heading-element"><span>Windows</span>
 <a href="#windows" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>可以直接下载 <a href="https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/latest"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">二进制文件</a>，然后手动将其添加到环境变量中</p>
<p>或者直接借助 Windows 的包管理工具 Winget 安装，就不用管环境变量了</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">winget install Hugo.Hugo.Extended
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 更新</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">winget upgrade Hugo.Hugo.Extended</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="linux" class="heading-element"><span>Linux</span>
 <a href="#linux" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>以 Ubuntu 为例，直接 <code>apt</code> 安装即可</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt install hugo</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="快速上手" class="heading-element"><span>快速上手</span>
 <a href="#%e5%bf%ab%e9%80%9f%e4%b8%8a%e6%89%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>这里简单记录下部署的命令，具体的流程可以参考 <a href="https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">官方教程</a></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span><span class="lnt">15
</span><span class="lnt">16
</span><span class="lnt">17
</span><span class="lnt">18
</span><span class="lnt">19
</span><span class="lnt">20
</span><span class="lnt">21
</span><span class="lnt">22
</span><span class="lnt">23
</span><span class="lnt">24
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 生成项目</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new site hugo-blog
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> hugo-blog
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote add origin xxx
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 以 FeelIt 主题为例</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule add git@github.com:khusika/FeelIt.git
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git submodule update
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 覆盖配置文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cp -r themes/FeelIt/exampleSite/hugo.toml .
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 生成空白文章</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo new posts/Hello-World.md
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 本地预览</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo server --disableFastRender
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 或者以 production 环境启动，方便调试评论系统等功能</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo server --disableFastRender -e production
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 生成静态文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">hugo</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="迁移博文" class="heading-element"><span>迁移博文</span>
 <a href="#%e8%bf%81%e7%a7%bb%e5%8d%9a%e6%96%87" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>接下来就是将 Hexo 的博文迁移到 Hugo 中，有几点要注意的</p>
<h3 id="front-matter" class="heading-element"><span>Front matter</span>
 <a href="#front-matter" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>hugo 的 Front matter 的部分变量名和 Hexo 的不一样，需要做一些转换</p>
<p>例如：<code>update</code> &ndash;&gt; <code>lastmod</code></p>
<h3 id="永久链接" class="heading-element"><span>永久链接</span>
 <a href="#%e6%b0%b8%e4%b9%85%e9%93%be%e6%8e%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>之前 hexo 用 hexo-abbrlink 插件生成的永久链接，现在需要将其转换为 Hugo 的格式</p>
<p>首先要将每篇博客中的 <code>abbrlink</code> 修改为 <code>slug</code>，然后在 <code>hugo.toml</code> 中修改如下配置</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-toml" data-lang="toml"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">[</span><span class="nx">permalinks</span><span class="p">]</span>

</div><h3 id="图片路径" class="heading-element"><span>图片路径</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9b%be%e7%89%87%e8%b7%af%e5%be%84" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

<p>而 hugo 可以直接放在同一目录下，然后使用相对路径即可，不过此时 Markdown 文件名需要改为 <code>index.md</code>，例如下面这样</p>

</div><h2 id="发布博客" class="heading-element"><span>发布博客</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%91%e5%b8%83%e5%8d%9a%e5%ae%a2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

<p>然后新建一个分支，例如 <code>gh-pages</code>，然后重新将 <code>gh-pages</code> 的分支设置为 GitHub Pages 的分支</p>
</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<p>接下来发布就比较简单了，个人选择手动 <code>git push</code> publish 文件夹到 GitHub 的对应仓库即可</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1

</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> public
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote add origin xxx
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git checkout -b gh-pages
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git add .
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit -m <span class="s2">&#34;first publish&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -u origin gh-pages</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="加快部署" class="heading-element"><span>加快部署</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8a%a0%e5%bf%ab%e9%83%a8%e7%bd%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="details admonition tip open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-lightbulb fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>技巧<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">GitHub Pages 的部署会尝试用 Jekyll 编译，但是 Hugo 的博客是不需要编译的，所以可以在仓库的根目录下添加一个 <code>.nojekyll</code> 文件，这样就可以加快部署速度</div>

item.title: Debug 从入门到入土
item.author: ywang_wnlo@qq.com (Zeus)
item.description:
<p>写代码难免遇到 bug，调试解决 bug 的快慢很影响开发的效率。本文主要是梳理并记录下个人经常用的调试方法（主要以 C/C++ 的 segment fault 为例）</p>
<h2 id="分类" class="heading-element"><span>分类</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%86%e7%b1%bb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>根据调试时机与 bug 产生的时间的前后关系，主要分为“事后”、“事中”、“事先”三类：</p>
<ul>
<li>“事后” 主要是通过 addr2line 或者 objdump 等工具，定位报错时的程序运行位置</li>
<li>“事中” 主要是通过 GDB 来观察程序运行时的状态，实时的捕捉 bug</li>
<li>“事先” 主要是通过在源代码中插入打印语句，来观察程序运行时各个变量的状态</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="事后" class="heading-element"><span>事后</span>
 <a href="#%e4%ba%8b%e5%90%8e" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>通常为了快速的定位 bug，会根据出错时的程序输出，来判断重新出错的位置</p>
<p>然而一般的程序输出可能不足以提供足够信息的情况，此时可以根据 <code>segmentation fault (core dumped)</code> 信息并且借助一些工具来定位出错的位置</p>
<h3 id="addr2line" class="heading-element"><span><code>addr2line</code></span>
 <a href="#addr2line" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>addr2line</code> 在程序<strong>含有 debug 信息</strong>时可以快速的将地址转换为文件名和行号</p>
<p>具体的使用方法可以通过 <code>man addr2line</code> 查看，这里简单介绍一下常用的用法</p>
<p>以下面的代码为例：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;stdio.h&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编译时加上 -g 选项，生成 debug 信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -no-pie 选项是为了避免 ASLR 的影响（高版本的 gcc 默认开启 ASLR）</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ gcc -g -no-pie test.c -o <span class="nb">test</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 运行程序，会出现 segmentation fault</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ ./test
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>1<span class="o">]</span> <span class="m">7533</span> segmentation fault <span class="o">(</span>core dumped<span class="o">)</span> ./test
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># dmesg 查看内核日志，可以看到 segmentation fault 的详细信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ dmesg <span class="p">|</span> tail -n <span class="m">2</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>46592.916853<span class="o">]</span> test<span class="o">[</span>7533<span class="o">]</span>: segfault at <span class="m">0</span> ip 000000000040111a sp 00007ffce6095a70 error <span class="m">6</span> in test<span class="o">[</span>401000+1000<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>46592.916875<span class="o">]</span> Code: c3 <span class="m">66</span> <span class="m">66</span> 2e 0f 1f <span class="m">84</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> 0f 1f <span class="m">40</span> <span class="m">00</span> f3 0f 1e fa eb 8a f3 0f 1e fa <span class="m">55</span> <span class="m">48</span> <span class="m">89</span> e5 <span class="m">48</span> c7 <span class="m">45</span> f8 <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">48</span> 8b <span class="m">45</span> f8 &lt;c7&gt; <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">02</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> b8 <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> 5d c3 <span class="m">66</span> 0f 1f <span class="m">84</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>此时可以根据 <code>ip 000000000040111a</code> 来定位出错的位置，<code>ip</code> 后面跟着的数字就是 IP 寄存器的值，也就是出错时的程序运行位置，可以通过 <code>addr2line</code> 来将其转换为文件名和行号</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 将地址转换为文件名和行号</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -f 选项表示输出函数名</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># -e 选项表示指定可执行文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ addr2line -f -e ./test 0x000000000040111a
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">main
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">/home/ywang/test.c:5</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>然而 <code>addr2line</code> 也有两个较为明显的局限：</p>
<ul>
<li>需要提前在编译时加上 <code>-g</code> 选项，生成 debug 信息</li>
<li>对于高版本的 gcc，需要加上 <code>-no-pie</code> 选项，避免 ASLR 的影响</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="objdump-反汇编" class="heading-element"><span><code>objdump</code> 反汇编</span>
 <a href="#objdump-%e5%8f%8d%e6%b1%87%e7%bc%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>通过 <code>objdump</code> 进行反汇编也是一种比较常用的定位 segmentation fault 的方法，这种方法能够精确的定位到执行的汇编指令，并且没有 <code>addr2line</code> 的上述限制，但是需要一定的汇编基础，否则看不懂汇编指令也是没用的</p>
<p>汇编指令的快速查询可以直接 Google 或者在一些工具站，例如 <a href="https://www.felixcloutier.com/x86/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【felixcloutier】</a> 或者 <a href="https://www.cs.virginia.edu/~evans/cs216/guides/x86.html#instructions"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">【University of Virginia Computer Science】x86 Assembly Guide</a> 上进行速查</p>
<p>以下面的代码为例：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;stdio.h&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="nf">func_bug</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">func_bug</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 无需任何选项，直接编译</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ gcc test.c -o <span class="nb">test</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 运行程序，会出现 segmentation fault</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ ./test
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>1<span class="o">]</span> <span class="m">8173</span> segmentation fault <span class="o">(</span>core dumped<span class="o">)</span> ./test
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># dmesg 查看内核日志，可以看到 segmentation fault 的详细信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ dmesg <span class="p">|</span> tail -n <span class="m">2</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>49630.541707<span class="o">]</span> test<span class="o">[</span>8173<span class="o">]</span>: segfault at <span class="m">0</span> ip 000055bce6f6c13d sp 00007fffad5149b0 error <span class="m">6</span> in test<span class="o">[</span>55bce6f6c000+1000<span class="o">]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>49630.541732<span class="o">]</span> Code: 5d c3 0f 1f <span class="m">00</span> c3 0f 1f <span class="m">80</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> f3 0f 1e fa e9 <span class="m">77</span> ff ff ff f3 0f 1e fa <span class="m">55</span> <span class="m">48</span> <span class="m">89</span> e5 <span class="m">48</span> c7 <span class="m">45</span> f8 <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">48</span> 8b <span class="m">45</span> f8 &lt;c7&gt; <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">02</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">00</span> <span class="m">90</span> 5d c3 f3 0f 1e fa <span class="m">55</span> <span class="m">48</span> <span class="m">89</span> e5 <span class="m">48</span> <span class="m">83</span> ec <span class="m">10</span> c7</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>由于没有关闭 ASLR，所以每次运行程序时，<code>ip</code> 的值都会不一样，但是可以简单的换算获取到实际偏移量</p>
<p>首先需要通过 <code>objdump</code> 获取 <code>.init</code> 段的起始地址，如下所示：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 获取 init 段的起始地址</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$ objdump -h ./test -j .init
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">./test: file format elf64-x86-64
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Sections:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Idx Name Size VMA LMA File off Algn
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="m">10</span> .init 0000001b <span class="m">0000000000001000</span> <span class="m">0000000000001000</span> <span class="m">00001000</span> 2**2
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> CONTENTS, ALLOC, LOAD, READONLY, CODE</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>我们查看 <code>VMA</code> 列，可以看到 <code>.init</code> 段的起始地址为 <code>0x1000</code>（个人经验，如果不对，欢迎 dalao 指正）</p>

</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">0000000000001129 &lt;func_bug&gt;:
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1129: f3 0f 1e fa endbr64
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 112d: 55 push %rbp
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 112e: 48 89 e5 mov %rsp,%rbp
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1131: 48 c7 45 f8 00 00 00 movq $0x0,-0x8(%rbp)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1138: 00
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1139: 48 8b 45 f8 mov -0x8(%rbp),%rax
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 113d: c7 00 02 00 00 00 movl $0x2,(%rax)
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1143: 90 nop
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1144: 5d pop %rbp
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 1145: c3 retq</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><p>结合源码以及汇编的前后内容不难分析出 <code>movl $0x2,(%rax)</code> 与源代码 <code>*p = 2;</code> 对应
而 <code>movq $0x0,-0x8(%rbp)</code> 以及 <code>mov -0x8(%rbp),%rax</code> 与源代码中的 <code>int *p = NULL;</code> 对应</p>
<p>因此不难判断出实际的出错原因为对空指针的进行了写操作</p>

</div><h2 id="事中" class="heading-element"><span>事中</span>
 <a href="#%e4%ba%8b%e4%b8%ad" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>

</h2><p>为了更好的查看出错时的程序的各个变量值，可以借助最强工具 <code>gdb</code> 来进行调试运行</p>
<h3 id="最强工具-gdb" class="heading-element"><span>最强工具 <code>gdb</code></span>
 <a href="#%e6%9c%80%e5%bc%ba%e5%b7%a5%e5%85%b7-gdb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>gdb</code> 是 GNU 出品的一个强大的调试工具，可以用来调试多种语言的程序，例如 C/C++、Go、Rust 等</p>
<p><code>gdb</code> 的使用方法非常多，这里只介绍一些常用的用法，更多的用法可以通过 <code>man gdb</code> 查看</p>
<p>同样需要在编译时加上 <code>-g</code> 选项，生成 debug 信息</p>

</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;stdio.h&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">void</span> <span class="nf">func_bug</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">NULL</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">*</span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">func_bug</span><span class="p">();</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">6</span> <span class="o">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">7</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">8</span> int main<span class="o">(</span>int argc, char *argv<span class="o">[])</span> <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">9</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="o">(</span><span class="nv">argc</span> <span class="o">==</span> 1<span class="o">)</span> <span class="o">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="m">10</span> printf<span class="o">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;usage: %s arg1\n&#34;</span>, argv<span class="o">[</span>0<span class="o">])</span><span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</h2><h3 id="printf" class="heading-element"><span><code>printf</code></span>
 <a href="#printf" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>虽然 <code>printf</code> 是最简单的调试方法，但是也是最常用的调试方法，基本上没有 <code>printf</code> 调试不出来的 bug</p>
<p><strong>一般流程如下：</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>通常对于一般的 bug，可以先根据出错时的程序输出，大致估计出错的位置</li>
<li>然后在源代码中插入打印语句，重新编译，再次运行程序</li>
<li>继续观察打印的输出，一步步的缩小出错的范围，最终定位到出错的位置</li>
<li>然后就可以打印出错位置的相应变量的值，进而分析出错原因</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>缺点：</strong></p>
<p>但是然而 <code>printf</code> 本身会造成程序的运行效率降低，有时会出现<strong>加了 <code>printf</code> 之后 bug 复现不了，去掉 <code>printf</code> 之后 bug 又复现了</strong>的情况</p>
<p>这种情况下就需要优化 <code>printf</code> 的方式，例如<strong>改用 <code>sprintf</code> 将内容输出到内存中，然后通过单独的线程 <code>fprintf</code> 转储到文件中</strong>，这样就会减少对程序的运行效率的影响</p>
<p>当然也可以换用后续的其他的调试方法</p>
<h3 id="assert" class="heading-element"><span><code>assert</code></span>
 <a href="#assert" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>assert</code> 是 C/C++ 中的一个宏，用于判断一个表达式是否为真，如果为假，则输出错误信息，并终止程序的运行</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#include</span> <span class="cpf">&lt;assert.h&gt;</span><span class="cp">
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kt">int</span> <span class="nf">main</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kt">int</span> <span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nf">assert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">a</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>例如上述代码会输出如下错误信息，并终止程序的运行：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">test: test.c:5: main: Assertion <span class="sb">`</span><span class="nv">a</span> <span class="o">==</span> 2<span class="err">&#39;</span> failed.
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="o">[</span>1<span class="o">]</span> <span class="m">3563773</span> abort <span class="o">(</span>core dumped<span class="o">)</span> ./test</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>因此我们可以提前在一些可能出错的地方插入 <code>assert</code> 语句，当程序运行到这里时，如果 <code>assert</code> 语句不成立，则会输出错误信息，并终止程序的运行，从而快速定位到出错的原因</p>
<p><strong>缺点：</strong></p>
<p>与 <code>printf</code> 一样，<code>assert</code> 也会造成程序的运行效率稍微降低，但是一般不会影响到 bug 的复现</p>
<p>但是为了程序的运行效率，程序 <code>release</code> 版本的时候应该将 <code>assert</code> 语句去掉，或者利用宏定义，在 <code>release</code> 的时候将 <code>assert</code> 语句替换成空语句</p>
<p>例如：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-c" data-lang="c"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1">// #define DEBUG
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#ifdef DEBUG
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#define ASSERT(x) assert(x)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#else
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#define ASSERT(x)
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="cp">#endif</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="小节" class="heading-element"><span>小节</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b0%8f%e8%8a%82" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>通常情况下，我个人会在出错后根据程序的编译耗时来进行选择 debug 的方式</p>
<ul>
<li>当程序编译耗时较短时，我会优先选择 <code>printf</code> 的方式来进行调试</li>
<li>而当程序编译耗时较长时，我会优先选择 <code>objdump</code> 的方式来进行判断，如果 <code>objdump</code> 无法快速定位到出错的位置，我会再选择 <code>gdb</code> 的方式来进行调试</li>
</ul>
